summary: A U.S. Marshall and two deputies rescue a cattle rustler from a lynch mob led by a local cattle baron convinced that the rustler also killed his son.
cast: Kirk Douglas|Virginia Mayo|John Agar|Walter Brennan|Ray Teal|Hugh Sanders|Morris Ankrum|James Anderson|Charles Meredith|Sam Ash|Bob Burns|Lane Chandler|Steve Clark|Russell Custer|Steve Darrell|Al Ferguson|Joe Garcio|Augie Gomez|Carl Harbaugh|Al Haskell|Jack Kenny|Al Kunde|Kenneth MacDonald|Jack Montgomery|Zon Murray|Jack Parker|Allen D. Sewall|Lucile Sewall|Guy Wilkerson
title: Camino de la horca
